mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a black and white photocopy of a photograph of buildings on a street corner. The handwritten caption reads: "Corner of Henry across from 1st Bapt. 2002 -- yards of two fraternity houses, visible above." It is extremely doubtful that the orignal photograph was taken in 2002. It appears to be a much older image. A handwritten note was attached to the photocopy: "Old McKemy Brothers Mom and Pop store across from First Bapt. Church at Henry and North Main Streets.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Corner of Henry across from 1st Bapt. (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans
Virginia -- Lexington
